page.title: 14LEISURE TIME IN WIMBORNE
page.content: My Mum and Dad play tennis in their spare time, my Mum also plays darts. Dad likes photography, he develops films himself and mounts them into slides. My brother Derek enjoys fishing at the Stock ponds and in the river at Wimborne. He also uses a metal detector and makes things with his electric set. On Monday evenings he goes to Cubs. I like knitting and I go to athletics coaching. After school I play football, rugby and rounders with my friends. On Thursdays I go to Brownies and cycling proficiency. Mum knits a lot of things for the family. When I go to bed and when I wake up in the morning my favourite occupation is reading a book. My hobby is collecting postcards, I have mounted 365 cards into a book and I have a few more as well. JOHANNE STEVENS. AGED 9 YEARS.
